titleStmt.title: Declamationum excerpta according to manuscript Vaticanus Chigianus H VIII 261. An Electronic transcription
titleStmt.author: Calpurnius Flaccus

availability.licence: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/.

layoutDesc.layout: In the section of Calpurnius (ff. 81v-90r), all pages have 40 lines except f. 88r and the last page (f. 90r).

handDesc.handNote: Unidentified hand that wrote most of manuscript.
Corrections by first hand or another hand.

char.charName: LATIN SMALL LETTER E WITH OGONEK
char.desc: The character ę (e caudata) has no standard mapping. The ę can be resolved in 'ae' in most cases, but also in 'oe' or 'e'.

hi.hi: Incipiunt Ex Calpurnio Flacco excerptae>: excerpta .x. Rhetorum minorum

space.desc: Reason: space eft empty for the title of decl. 4.

ab.w: accedereIs there an abbreviation mark? accendere(n)t?t

peraequatio
nemper/aequationem seem to be 2 different words.
queriIssue: should it be queri or quaeri?

space.desc: The seven dots could be for 'flaccus'.

ab.w: noluiHåkanson reads volui instead of nolui, but it is inconsistent with the reading "nobis" in decl. 53.

space.desc: Reason: space eft empty for the title of decl. 40.
